url.description:
A URL that can be opened by the webview when using the Opener APIs.

Wildcards can be used following the UNIX glob pattern.

Examples:

- "https://*" : allows all HTTPS origin

- "https://*.github.com/tauri-apps/tauri": allows any subdomain of "github.com" with the "tauri-apps/api" path

- "https://myapi.service.com/users/*": allows access to any URLs that begins with "https://myapi.service.com/users/"

app.description: An application to open this url with, for example: firefox.

path.description:
A path that can be opened by the webview when using the Opener APIs.

The pattern can start with a variable that resolves to a system base directory. The variables are: `$AUDIO`, `$CACHE`, `$CONFIG`, `$DATA`, `$LOCALDATA`, `$DESKTOP`, `$DOCUMENT`, `$DOWNLOAD`, `$EXE`, `$FONT`, `$HOME`, `$PICTURE`, `$PUBLIC`, `$RUNTIME`, `$TEMPLATE`, `$VIDEO`, `$RESOURCE`, `$APP`, `$LOG`, `$TEMP`, `$APPCONFIG`, `$APPDATA`, `$APPLOCALDATA`, `$APPCACHE`, `$APPLOG`.

app.description: An application to open this path with, for example: xdg-open.

anyOf.description: If true, allow open with any application.
Allow specific application to open with.
